publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3546.1 Jim Hume: Wood News is Good News—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3546) in the name of Bill Kidd, insert at end "and believes that the Scottish Government should continue its new-found commitment to Scottish woodland by dropping immediately its misguided and widely opposed plans to lease out 25% of the national forest estate to private investment companies." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-3546.1 Jim Hume: Wood News is Good News—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3546) in the name of Bill Kidd, insert at end "and believes that the Scottish Government should continue its new-found commitment to Scottish woodland by dropping immediately its misguided and widely opposed plans to lease out 25% of the national forest estate to private investment companies." Supported by: Robin Harper*, Mike Pringle*, Liam McArthur*, Patrick Harvie*, Robert Brown*
S3M-3546.1 Wood News is Good News (lodged on 26 February 2009) Elaine Murray*, Margaret Smith*, Bill Butler*
S3M-3546.1 Wood News is Good News (lodged on 26 February 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*
